prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Bass, Drums, Piano, but without Reed.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Guitar, Bass, and Drums, but no Reed.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Bass, Drums, and Piano, Reed excluded.

Style 3:
No Reed is included in this song, but it does have Guitar, Bass, Drums, and Piano.
